mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game_results ( nickname, guess_count, actual_count, time_taken, played_at ) VALUES ( #{nickname}, #{guessCount}, #{actualCount}, #{timeTaken}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY time_taken, id) AS ranking, id, nickname, time_taken, played_at FROM game_results ORDER BY time_taken, id;
